short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart right-click menu combining AI search (ChatGPT) and traditional search. Fully customizable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right Click Assistant - Your Smart Search Companion

Transform your right-click menu into a powerful search tool that prioritizes AI-powered search while supporting traditional search engines.

üî• KEY FEATURES:

ü§ñ AI-Powered Search (Priority)
‚Ä¢ ChatGPT - Get instant AI analysis of selected text
‚Ä¢ Perplexity - Smart, context-aware search results

üîç Traditional Search Integration
‚Ä¢ Google Search - The world's most popular search engine
‚Ä¢ X Search - Real-time social media search
‚Ä¢ Baidu Search - Leading Chinese search engine

‚ö°Ô∏è Customization & Flexibility
‚Ä¢ Add your favorite search engines
‚Ä¢ Enable/disable search providers
‚Ä¢ Customize search URL templates

üí° How to Use:
1. Select any text on a webpage
2. Right-click to open the context menu
3. Choose your preferred search engine
4. Get instant results in a new tab

üîß Custom Search Variables:
‚Ä¢ {text_selected} - Your selected text
‚Ä¢ {url} - Current page URL
‚Ä¢ {title} - Current page title

Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ Students researching topics
‚Ä¢ Professionals fact-checking information
‚Ä¢ Developers looking up documentation
‚Ä¢ Anyone who wants smarter search options

Free, open-source, and constantly improving!
